Name: Toggle
Description: A two-state button that can be either on or off.

PropData.Name: asChild
PropData.Description: Change the default rendered element for the one passed as a child, merging their props and behavior.  Read our Composition guide for more details.

PropData.Name: defaultPressed
PropData.Description: The pressed state of the toggle when it is initially rendered. Use when you do not need to control its pressed state.

PropData.Name: pressed
PropData.Description: The controlled pressed state of the toggle. Must be used in conjunction with onPressedChange.

PropData.Name: onPressedChange
PropData.Description: Event handler called when the pressed state of the toggle changes.

PropData.Name: disabled
PropData.Description: Event handler called when the pressed state of the toggle changes.
